text: I worked closely with Matthew for over 4 years and he consistently would go above and beyond to not just deliver software but discuss, educate, and collaborate at each step of the process.
name: Josh Feinberg

text: During all my time in tech, I've met no other developer as capable as this guy is. Matt is truly a unique talent, and someone I would recommend over and over. He's been a huge asset to my team in brainstorming sessions, he's helped us re-tool our tech stack, sprint planning, and more. He's a legend!
name: Chance Mayfield

text: Matt created a logo, brand packaging and a website for our new company with little direction from us and everyone comments how awesome it is.  He is so creative and timely with all projects!
name: Shelli Kranz
